Posts.Content: SingSunny229 wrote: First off, I am 41 years old.  I am high risk in some areas and not in others for breast cancer.  I've taken the Gail Model risk assesment and it puts me at 3% over 10 years.  I do not have children, had early menses, my breasts are quite dense, I have been on birth control for a number of years. There is not breast cancer in the family, but my mother, grandmother, aunt, great aunt,all had benign growths.  Not cancer, but still high chance for some type of growth.  I get regular mammograms, in fact just had one a few weeks ago.  I am slim, don't smoke, exercise several times per week. I am hyperthyroid and always wondered whether this condition puts me at higher risk for cancer. Would like to learn more online if possible.  Any thoughts, similar risk factors? Thanks for the sharing of experiences and opinions on this site.  Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Several risk factors SingSunny229 SingSunny229
